resources.string: Sign up by clicking on the Sign In button. Thank you for choosing OTTAA Project.
To renew your license please contact us.
Thank you for choosing OTTAA Project.
Your trial period has just begun. Thank you for choosing OTTAA Project.
Sorry, for the first use you need to be connected to internet. Sorry for this inconvenience.
Hello I am Juan, I have communication problems and I use this system, I need you to wait for me.
A new version of OTTAA is available. Please update to the lastest version to get all the new cool features.
Choose the calendar with your daily routine.
It allows to use the application by scanning
Use artificial intelligence to generate a richer sentence. You need a stable internet connection.
Allow to disable the function Edit Pictograms.
This function available the double click function to select a pictogram .
Sorry, these pictograms can not be edited.
ERROR: 112. The function is not available in your device.
ERROR: 312. The Google Play services APK is not up-to-date please install the latest version.
ERROR: 222. We are having problems to connect to the server, please try again later.
ERROR: 568. TextToSpeech engine is not working.
Do you want to save changes ?
Do you want to restore the factory settings ?
Do you want to create a new Pictogram ?
Do you want to delete the selected Pictogram ?
Do you want to delete the selected Group ?
Now, we are going to guide you to create a sentence with voice using OTTAA Project.
Find share configurations options on the top bar.
Select the pictogram you want by clicking on it.
We are ready! Touch the OTTAA logo to start talking.
Touch the reset icon, or press the back key, to create a new sentence.
Touch the spinner to find more related pictos.
Click to delete one picto, click and hold to delete everything
Add more pictos to this gallery
Pressing the \"link\" button you can add more pictos to this gallery.
Pressing inside the circle you can change the pictos image.
What do you want to say?
Edit the text so the picto will say whatever you want.
Press the OTTAA logo to play the text of the picto.
Categorize the picto based on the Fitzgerald color code to improve the output. Green:Actions Yellow:People Blue:Adjectives Orange: Nouns Magenta: Miscellanea
You can link this category with the calendar or with a GPS location.
Link this group with a Calendar entry
You can link this group with certain event so at that time and date, this pictos will popup.
Link this set of pictograms with certain GPS location. so when are near that location the pictos will popup Dont forget to set the desired location in settings.
Choose the pictograms for the group
Are you sure you want to close Edit Picto ?
Do you want to save it ?
Please write the name of the Pictogram
Select the pictograms you want to link with the group
We are sorry you need internet to use this feature.
Here are the recommended options, sorted by priority.

Write your custom text for the Picto
Choose the image for the new Picto
Enter the text to say it loud, can be a single word or a full sentence. Is up to you!
Enter the text to name the Picto
Pick a color for the frame
Type what you are looking for...
Touch the search button to download a picto from ARASAAC
Allow OTTAA App the following permissions?
This lets OTTAA app to store and access information from your device.
This lets OTTAA app to access the location
Please make sure you access all the permission to access the application contents smoothly.
If you enjoy using OTTAA please rate us , that will help us improve.
To purchase a subscription please click on Purchase Subscription
There was a problem Signing in , try again.

QUANTITY OF PHRASES DURING THE MONTH
DURING THE DAY AND THE HOUR

Take the tutorial again and learn a few more tips on how to use OTTAA
Learn more about ottaa updates and your account
There is no pictos to select
Upps can not be played in this group because it has no pictograms
Downloading Picts and Groups from your country ...
Check your internet connection, and try again.
We are working to synchronize the images, for the moment, reload the images of the pictos / modified groups
If you do not accept the permissions we can not access your photos or the camera
We are synchronizing your pictograms / groups
If you do not grant the permission you can not download the photos
Please select at least one pictogram when you want to share in a social media
If you selected this button, you will hear the name of the pictogram to select
"Pressing the plus (+) icon you can create your own picto.\t "
"Pressing the plus (+) icon you can create your own category.\t "
"You can choose the picto you want by clicking it. Press and hold to move it. Double tap to edit ,delete or . "
You will find the picto you want by looking into one of the categories. Press and hold the selected category to move it, or double tap to edit it or delete it.
Enjoy your new pictos based on your location.
This function allows you to restore OTTAA to a previous point to recover lost data.
There was a problem with the database, please restore OTTAA to a previous saved point in order to restore your data.
Get access today to all the useful features that OTTAA Premium has to offer for only 9 USD per month
This function allows you to synchronize images
Now you will find suggested pictograms as transparent pictos, use them to create images with more ease.
This function allows controlling the application using the face
Quickly choose among your most used phrases
This function delete the text after you speak
Here you will find all the pictos sorted by categories.
This function will control screen scanning function with the OTTAA Project scroll
Share on your social media with audio or an image
By choosing TAGs you help us to predict better when to show certain pictos to you, based on Time, Location, Calendar or Weather
Please save the group first to assign Tags
Please save the picto first to assign Tags
Please add pictos to the group
Wait while your groups are loaded.
We are working on this function, it will be available soon
Su sesion expiró, vuelva a iniciar sesion.
Wait while your Picts are loaded.
Error ... the text could not be translated
The pictograms are loaded according to the user age.
In case of being a professional it is recommended: Have a profile for each patient. In this way the user increases their vocabulary
By clicking on the Sign In button you accept the terms and conditions
Select the color of the screen scanning
Desktop Mode: Joystick oriented horizontally Chair Mode: Joystick oriented vertically
In order to have a better prediction, it is necessary that you select the gender and age of the user in order to be able to order the pictograms

The game is to guess which is the winning pictogram 1) The system issues the following question aloud: What is the \"Name of Pictogram\" pictogram? 2) The user selects the pictogram. 3) The system verifies if it is the winner or not and accordingly emits a sound
Alright now let\'s say each of the pictograms aloud
" Answer the questions by choosing the right pictogram. Learn by playing!"
Now we are going to join the pictograms
Select the operation of on-screen scanning
Get access to educational games that allow you to evaluate vocabulary in a fun way
With the premium version you can use the GPS to have a better prediction based on the commerce or place where you are
Use OTTAA Project with screen scanning, connect accessible buttons and much more.
With the premium version you will have access to a detailed report of the use you make of OTTAA Project, it allows you to measure your progress
Customized the velocity about the Screen-Scanning or the click-Time
Touch one or more pictograms to create a sentence as long as you want. The pictograms are automatically related and you will always have one more pictogram to add.
Once the phrase is created, touch the OTTAA logo to speak aloud or using the share icon, you can send your phrase through the most used social networks.
"In OTTAA you have access to thousands of pictograms to talk about whatever you want, find the Picto Gallery in the lower left corner of the main screen. "
Enter the games section to learn by playing. OTTAA has didactic games to learn vocabulary, concepts and much more. Also, more games will be available soon!
Check if the info is correct,\nif not, change it as you wish. This will help us to personalize the app for you.
We are helping thousand of speech impaired children to communicate, improving their life quality
Select now how you would like to learn how to use OTTAA, you can go back to this screen later on.
Our free workshop allows you to learn how to use OTTAA
We will ask you for certain information\nto improve your experience with OTTAA.
Hello,\nLet\'s get to know each other a little bit.

○With Explanatory Videos
○With 6 specialized modules
○Autonomous and at your own pace
○Completely free of charge
○40 minutes long
Choose a character that best represents you.
We offer you several options to\nlearn how to use it and get the most out of it.
" ○30 minutes demo ○Guided tour to main features ○New features explained ○Absolutely FREE "
Book a demo with one of our specialist to help you better understand our AAC
